name: Surging Undercurrent
description:
When played: If Abyss Herald: Wicked Torrents, who has this card equipped, has already triggered Watery Rebirth, then create 1 Curse of the Undercurrent on the opposing playing field.
When Abyss Herald: Wicked Torrents, who has this card equipped, is defeated or triggers Watery Rebirth: Create 1 Curse of the Undercurrent on the opposing playing field.
(You must have Abyss Herald: Wicked Torrents in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
